entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Tuesday 31 January 2023
